main event: An object was observed in the sky, initially thought to be a satellite, by a witness on 15 August 1965.
interesting points: The object was seen at a 60-degree elevation moving to the East,The object was described as one light resembling a satellite,There was a conclusion stating it was a satellite based on 25/26 sightings,Further investigation indicated it may have been an unidentifiable object causing anomalous effects,The object was reported to have movement that suggested temperature inversion.
witness description: the observer described the object as resembling a satellite
